title: Bay of Ceuta
text: The Bay of Ceuta is a bay on the African coast of the <a href="Straits%20of%20Gibraltar">Straits of Gibraltar</a>. It accounts for the majority of the north coast of the <a href="Spain">Spanish</a> <a href="city">city</a> of <a href="Ceuta">Ceuta</a>. It stretches from Punta Blanca in the west to <a href="Isla%20de%20Santa%20Catalina">Isla de Santa Catalina</a>, off the coast of the <a href="Pen%C3%ADnsula%20de%20Almina">Península de Almina</a> in the east, a distance of eight kilometres (five miles). Ceuta's harbour lies on the bay.
